column4: I have an odd problem. Anyone willing to help? (it involves the install of a custom-ish 7.04)
lol, because it seems rather busy in here :P Here goes: The installer tells me I don't have a / partition even when I have it set. The first error it gives it just a bunch of question marks.
Yeah, it's set to be formatted. The odd thing is it works just fine in VmWare
